thread.title: BRIEF-BRP Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share C$0.96

title: BRIEF-BRP Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share C$0.96
text: March 21, 2018 / 10:10 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-BRP Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share C$0.96 Reuters Staff March 21 (Reuters) - Brp Inc: * BRP REPORTS FOURTH-QUARTER AND RECORD FISCAL YEAR 2018 RESULTS * Q4 REVENUE C$1.263 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW C$1.24 BILLION * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE C$0.96 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW C$0.91 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * ‍ANNOUNCED A QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF $0.09 PER SHARE, AN INCREASE FROM $0.08 DIVIDEND PAID IN PREVIOUS QUARTER​ * SEES ‍FY 2019 NORMALIZED EPS $2.70 TO $2.82 ​ * EXPECTING CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF ABOUT $315M TO $330M IN FY19 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
